item.title: 🔴 20:40 Air alert in Zolotonisky district. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 20:40 Air alert in Zolotonisky district. Follow further messages. #Zolotonisky_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:01 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
